text: Joe Boyce (born 1 February 1994) is an Australian professional rugby league footballer who plays for the Townsville Blackhawks in the Queensland Cup. Primarily a , he previously played for the Brisbane Broncos in the National Rugby League. ==Background== Born on the Sunshine Coast, Queensland, Boyce played his junior football for the Sunshine Coast Sea Eagles, Nambour Crushers and Norths Devils, before being signed by the Newcastle Knights. ==Playing career== ===Early career=== After trialling with the Penrith Panthers, a Newcastle Knights scout signed Boyce to a 2-year contract starting in 2013. In 2013 and 2014, he played for the Knights' NYC team. In October 2014, he signed a 2-year contract with the Brisbane Broncos starting in 2015, following Knights coach Wayne Bennett to the Broncos. ===2015=== In Round 11 of the 2015 NRL season, Boyce made his NRL debut for the Broncos against his former club, the Newcastle Knights. ===2018=== After a number of seasons playing for the Broncos' feeder clubs, Boyce joined the Townsville Blackhawks for the 2018 season.https://www.qrl.com.au/news/20182/01/02/townsville-blackhawks-gains- and-losses/ ==References== ==External links== *2015 Brisbane Broncos profile Category:1994 births Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Brisbane Broncos players Category:Sunshine Coast Sea Eagles players Category:Norths Devils players Category:Souths Logan Magpies players Category:Rugby league locks Category:Rugby league players from Queensland Category:Living people
title: Joe Boyce
